net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.shapes
Class TextShape

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.shapes.AbstractShape
      net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.shapes.LineShape
          net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.shapes.TextShape

public class TextShape
extends LineShape

Creates a Text shape for use within a gauge. The generated shape is actually a Line shape. That way we can still apply the needed transforms for building the text. Cool font tricks http://www.java2s.com/Code/Java/2D-Graphics-GUI/Paints.htm
